evolutionmod:Adaptation.NAME: Adaptation
evolutionmod:Adaptation.DESCRIPTION: Adapt a Strike or Defend with your rightmost Gene. NL Reduce its cost by 1 this turn.
evolutionmod:Adaptation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Adapt a Strike or Defend with your two rightmost Genes. NL Reduce its cost by 1 this turn.

evolutionmod:Evolution.NAME: Evolution
evolutionmod:Evolution.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evolve !M! Genes different from those currently channeled when drawn

evolutionmod:HoofKick.NAME: Hoof Kick
evolutionmod:HoofKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Evolve a [#B06050]Centaur[] gene

evolutionmod:WindUp.NAME: Wind up
evolutionmod:WindUp.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards NL Adapt this with a Centaur gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times.

evolutionmod:Stampede.NAME: Stampede
evolutionmod:Stampede.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies twice. NL Evolve a Centaur gene.

evolutionmod:Brambles.NAME: Brambles
evolutionmod:Brambles.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block NL Gain !M! Brambles NL Evolve a [#60B040]Plant[] gene

evolutionmod:VineLash.NAME: Vine lash
evolutionmod:VineLash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Brambles NL Adapt this with a [#60B040]Plant[] gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times NL Deal damage equal to twice your Thorns.

evolutionmod:Constrict.NAME: Constrict
evolutionmod:Constrict.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply Constricted equal to your Thorns and Brambles to an enemy NL Evolve a [#60B040]Plant[] gene
evolutionmod:Constrict.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply Constricted equal to your Thorns and Brambles to all enemies NL Evolve a [#60B040]Plant[] gene

evolutionmod:TalonStrike.NAME: Talon strike
evolutionmod:TalonStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Evolve a [#FFFF80]Harpy[] gene

evolutionmod:TakeOff.NAME: Take Off
evolutionmod:TakeOff.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block NL draw 1 card NL Adapt this with a [#FFFF80]Harpy[] gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times.

evolutionmod:FeatherStorm.NAME: Feather Storm
evolutionmod:FeatherStorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each 2 cards in your hand NL Evolve a [#FFFF80]Harpy[] gene

evolutionmod:WaterBolt.NAME: Water bolt
evolutionmod:WaterBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Apply !M! Weak NL Evolve a [#5252FF]Merfolk[] gene

evolutionmod:Dive.NAME: Dive
evolutionmod:Dive.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block NL Adapt this with a [#5252FF]Merfolk[] gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times.

evolutionmod:Drown.NAME: Drown
evolutionmod:Drown.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block NL At the end of this turn the enemy will take your block as damage NL Evolve a [#5252FF]Merfolk[] gene

evolutionmod:Charm.NAME: Charm
evolutionmod:Charm.DESCRIPTION: reduce the strength of the enemy by !M! until the end of the turn NL Evolve a [#F04040]Succubus[] gene

evolutionmod:Strip.NAME: Strip
evolutionmod:Strip.DESCRIPTION: remove all Block from the enemy NL deal !D! damage NL Adapt this with a [#F04040]Succubus[] gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times.

evolutionmod:Seduce.NAME: Seduce
evolutionmod:Seduce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Give yourself and the enemy Block equal to the unblocked damage NL Evolve a [#F04040]Succubus[] gene

evolutionmod:FlameStrike.NAME: Flame Strike
evolutionmod:FlameStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Evolve a [#FF9050]Lavafolk[] gene.

evolutionmod:Fireballs.NAME: Fireballs
evolutionmod:Fireballs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Adapt this with a [#FF9050]Lavafolk[] gene.

evolutionmod:ChannelMagic.NAME: Channel magic
evolutionmod:ChannelMagic.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Lavafolk Form until your next turn. NL Adapt this with a [#FF9050]Lavafolk[] gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times.

evolutionmod:Eruption.NAME: Eruption
evolutionmod:Eruption.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Gain !M! Eruption NL Evolve a [#FF9050]Lavafolk[] gene.

evolutionmod:DrainMana.NAME: Drain Mana
evolutionmod:DrainMana.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 to !M! cards. NL Evolve a [#5090FF]Lymean[] gene.

evolutionmod:Purify.NAME: Purify
evolutionmod:Purify.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 to !M! cards. NL Adapt this with a [#50FFFF]Lymean[] gene.

evolutionmod:AquaticForm.NAME: Aquatic form
evolutionmod:AquaticForm.DESCRIPTION: Increase the effect of Merfolk and Lizard Genes by !M!

evolutionmod:MagicForm.NAME: Magic form
evolutionmod:MagicForm.DESCRIPTION: Increase the effect of Lavafolk and Lymean Genes by !M!

evolutionmod:StrengthForm.NAME: Strength form
evolutionmod:StrengthForm.DESCRIPTION: Increase the effect of Centaur and Beast Genes by !M!

evolutionmod:MagicForm.NAME: Magic form
evolutionmod:MagicForm.DESCRIPTION: Increase the effect of Lavafolk and Lizard Genes by !M!

evolutionmod:Offbeat.NAME: Offbeat
evolutionmod:Offbeat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Tempo !melodyMod:T!: hits twice

mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.NAME: Closing Barrage
mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deals Y damage X times, where Y is equal to your total [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] multiplied by !M!.
mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deals Y damage X+1 times, where Y is equal to your total [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] multiplied by !M!.

mysticmodref:Flourish.NAME: Flourish
mysticmodref:Flourish.DESCRIPTION: Costs [E] less for each stack of [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[]. Deal !D! damage twice, then double the [#5299DC]Power[] and [#FF5252]Poise[] amounts.
